abstract: A substantial number of the world’s wealthiest people have moved their money out of stocks and bonds and into cash, the head of HSBC‘s Swiss private banking unit said on Monday.
lead_paragraph: A substantial number of the world’s wealthiest people have moved their money out of stocks and bonds and into cash, the head of HSBC‘s Swiss private banking unit said on Monday.

headline.main: Many Wealthy Investors Shift to Cash, HSBC Says
